en-US.name: Spanish 21
en-US.summary: Play the popular Blackjack variant Spanish 21
en-US.description: This expansion pack includes Spanish 21, a popular Blackjack variant that features doubling on any number of cards and bonus payouts for hitting 21 with five or more cards.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: Spanish 21 allows you to play this popular Blackjack variant featuring doubling on any number of cards and bonus payouts for hitting 21 with five or more cards.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Enjoy Spanish 21 by asking Alexa to select a new game.

testingInstructions: After purchasing Spanish 21, you can say 'Select a new game' which will allow you to switch between normal Blackjack and the Blackjack variant Spanish 21.
